alert.note: Alert for Allen; Avoyelles; Evangeline; Rapides; Vernon (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 17 at 2:20AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Rapides, northwestern Evangeline, central Avoyelles, southeastern Vernon and northeastern Allen Parishes through 300 AM CDT... At 220 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Brouillette to Fullerton. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Alexandria, Pineville, Oakdale, Marksville, Glenmora, Moreauville, Cheneyville, Elizabeth, Bordelonville, Effie, Hineston, Pitkin, Mansura, Lecompte, Hessmer, Otis, Lake Ophelia National Wildlife Refuge, Elmer, Sieper and Poland. This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 54 and 86. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 AM CDT for central, southwestern and west central Louisiana.
